Class ActionsManager

  • Object
    • ActionsManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class ActionsManager
extends Object
implements Subject<ActionsManager>
    Conserve l'historique des actions effectuées.

    5.0 29/01/2020
    Version:
    6.2
    Author:
